author: Staff Reporter
text: A three-member peer team from National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) is visiting the Muthurangam Government Arts College from March 28 to 30. L.N. Dahiya, former pro vice-chancellor of Maharshi Dayanad University, Haryana, is the chairperson of the team visiting for NAAC re-accreditation.
title: NAAC peer team to visit Muthurangam College
